Sony’s Playstation 3 is Not Worth the Hype

18 November 2006

Sony’s Playstation 3 is Not Worth the Hype. “[…] I wouldn’t recommend buying one, not even for the regular price, which is plenty expensive without the import markup […] There just isn’t the leverage there to make buying a PS3 de rigeur.”
